sys_ux_client_script.name: Multitask Selector - On Link Clicked

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_11487c3ac342d21044643eec05013161
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record page 3 column layout">7848b43ac342d21044643eec05013181</macroponent><name>Multitask Selector - On Link Clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var id = event.payload.context.row.key;
    helpers.timing.setTimeout(function() {
        var idx = this.location.href.indexOf('/record/');
        var path = this.location.href.substring(0, idx) + '/record/task/' + id;
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        external: {
            url: path
        }
    });
    }, 0);
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-27 03:53:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>11487c3ac342d21044643eec05013161</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Multitask Selector - On Link Clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ePOs" source="x_1097202_epos">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ePOs">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_11487c3ac342d21044643eec05013161</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-27 03:53:32</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
